extends java.lang.Object

      • getRandomInt

        Returns a random integer.
        Parameters:

      • setSeed

        public static void setSeed(long new_seed)
        Sets the seed for the random integer generator
        Parameters:
        new_seed - is the seed value.

      • createCritter

        public static void createCritter(java.lang.String critter_class_name)
                          throws InvalidCritterException
        create and initialize a Critter subclass. critter_class_name must be the qualified name of a concrete subclass of Critter, if not, an InvalidCritterException must be thrown. Adds the critter to the population.
        Parameters:
        critter_class_name - the class name of the critter to be created
        Throws:
        InvalidCritterException - if the critter type is not valid.

      • getInstances

        public static java.util.List<Critter> getInstances(java.lang.String critter_class_name)
                                            throws InvalidCritterException
        Gets a list of critters of a specific type.
        Parameters:
        critter_class_name - What kind of Critter is to be listed. Unqualified class name.
        Returns:
        List of Critters.
        Throws:
        InvalidCritterException - if requesting a critter of that does not exist.

      • clearWorld

        public static void clearWorld()
        Clear the world of all critters, dead and alive

      • worldTimeStep

        public static void worldTimeStep()
        Performs the timeStep for each critter, does encounters, updates rest energy, adds clovers, adds babies to the population.

      • updateRestEnergy

        private void updateRestEnergy()
        Subtracts a constant rest energy cost from the critter.

      • doEncounters

        private static void doEncounters()
        Checks if a critter is in the same spot as other critters. If so, the critters will decide if they want to fight. Based on their decisions, a dice is rolled. The critter with the highest dice roll will win the fight. The loser of each 1v1 fight surrenders half their energy to the victor and dies.

      • genClover

        private static void genClover()
        Generates as many clovers as the refresh clover count specifies.

      • displayWorld

        public static void displayWorld()
        Displays the alive critters in the 2x2 grid format with their respective character representations

      • runStats

        public static void runStats(java.util.List<Critter> critters)
        Prints out how many Critters of a certain type there are on the board.
        Parameters:
        critters - List of Critters.

      • doTimeStep

        public abstract void doTimeStep()

      • getEnergy

        protected int getEnergy()

      • walk

        protected final void walk(int direction)
        Makes the critter moves one unit if it hasn't moved already in a certain timeStep. Regardless, will cut energy.
        Parameters:
        direction - in which to move the critter.

      • run

        protected final void run(int direction)
        Makes the critter move two units if it hasn't moved already in a certain timeStep. Regardless, will cut energy.
        Parameters:
        direction - in which to move the critter

      • move

        private void move(int amount,
                  int Direction)
        Will moves the critter in a certain direction by a certain amount. If the critter moves off the grid, will wrap around.
        Parameters:
        amount - is the number of units to move in a certain direction
        Direction - to move the critter.

      • reproduce

        protected final void reproduce(Critter offspring,
                               int direction)
        If the parent has sufficient energy, it'll will create an offspring giving half it's energy and keeping it next to them.
        Parameters:
        offspring - references the offspring to be filled in if the parent is healthy enough
        direction - in relation to the parent where the child will appear next time step.
